TaskDefinition.name: New IT Role Mining
TaskDefinition.Description: IT Role Mining based on a population, List of applications/entitlements and thresholds.

Argument.name: identityFilter
Argument.Prompt: Filter that restricts the population of identities to mine roles from.

Argument.name: applications
Argument.Prompt: IDs for Applications that contain the users and entitlements from which roles are mined

Argument.name: includedEntitlements
Argument.Prompt: Entitlements from which to mine roles

Argument.name: minIdentities
Argument.Prompt: Minimum number of identities that must contain a given entitlement set to generate a candidate role

Argument.name: minEntitlements
Argument.Prompt: Mininmum number of entitlements that must be in an entitlement set to generate a candidate role

Argument.name: maxCandidateRoles
Argument.Prompt: Maximum number of candidate roles that will be generated before the task starts discarding data
